name: (MPS) Microsoft Provisioning Front End
short_description: Open source front-end to the Microsoft Provisioning Engine (MPS) and Hosted Active Directory, Hosted Exchange. This project is aimed at users of the MPS system that would like basic functions provided by a simple interface.
